entry.title: Apple Watch Ultra Review: Big, Expensive, But Totally Worth It (For Me)

media:group.media:title: Apple Watch Ultra Review: Big, Expensive, But Totally Worth It (For Me)
media:group.media:description:
The Apple Watch Ultra isn't for everyone. It has a huge display and thick case that's guaranteed to attract some attention; it's about $800 with bands that cost $99; and its feature set is overkill for the vast majority of users... But it was one of the best tech purchases I've made and I feel like I'm missing something when it's not on my wrist.
Apple Watch Ultra on Apple.com: https://www.apple.com/apple-watch-ultra/
SUPPLEMENTAL CONTENT:
Watch: I Used Apple Watch Ultra WITHOUT an iPhone... (Unboxing Therapy): https://youtu.be/SWrXT5X-Ke4

Watch: WatchOS 9.1 is Out! - What's New? (zollotech): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wwSxkXPjkfg

media:group.media:title: FlexiSpot Ergonomic Chair Pro Review
media:group.media:description:
Don't sacrifice your body to save a few bucks. If you sit at your desk for long periods of time like me, you really should invest in a premium office chair that is comfortable and helps improve your posture. Bonus points if it looks good. After testing FlexiSpot's new Ergonomic Chair Pro, I can say that it checks all those boxes. For about $630, it's certainly not cheap but it could absolutely be worth the investment if you find yourself desk-bound for long periods of time. It's also worth noting that it's considerably cheaper than many of Herman Miller's offerings.
FlexiSpot Ergonomic Chair Pro (OC14): https://bit.ly/3CrNa7K
FlexiSpot Tech Day Sale: https://bit.ly/3QIPqvD
#MyFlexiDesk #flexiblewfh

entry.title: Insta360 ONE RS Review: Modularity FTW!

media:group.media:title: Insta360 ONE RS Review: Modularity FTW!
media:group.media:description:
After testing out this camera, I've come to the conclusion that we need to modularize all the things... smartphones, laptops, cameras, TVs, and more. The ability to swap out the battery with a new, fully-charged cell is super convenient. You can literally flip the screen module around to take selfie pictures or videos. But, arguably the best feature of all is the ability to swap out the lenses so you can capture 360 photos/videos or 4K ultra-wide action camera shots, depending on your needs. Starting at $299, the Insta360 ONE RS isn't exactly cheap, however it should significantly improve your content creation game.
Buy the Insta360 ONE RS (affiliate link): https://www.insta360.com/sal/one_rs?insrc=INR48D7
Insta360 ONE RS Bundle at Apple.com: https://www.apple.com/shop/product/HQ2U2ZM/A/insta360-one-rs-twin-edition-apple-bundle

entry.title: OnePlus 10 Pro 5G Review: Two Months Later

media:group.media:title: OnePlus 10 Pro 5G Review: Two Months Later
media:group.media:description:
This is why we don't rush out a review on Day 1. At launch, the OnePlus 10 Pro 5G was struggling to compete against some of the Google and Samsung flagships, most notably in the camera department and 5G compatibility. Two months later and the OnePlus 10 Pro 5G is looking better than ever. Not only has it been certified with Verizon's 5G network, but it's received several big camera updates that significantly boosts performance across all main camera sensors. There's now even a ultra high-end model with 12GB RAM and 256GB storage for those wanting even more power.
OnePlus 10 Pro 5G on Amazon: https://amzn.to/3OCIA9f
OnePlus 10 Pro 5G (12GB RAM; 256GB Storage): https://www.oneplus.com/oneplus-10-pro

entry.title: Two of the Best Motorized Standing Desks (2022)

media:group.media:title: Two of the Best Motorized Standing Desks (2022)
media:group.media:description:
#DIY #DeskTour #DeskSetup
Beau HD reviews the FlexiSpot E7 standing desk and compares it against the DIY motorized standing desk he built last year. What you'll find is that the do-it-yourself option is going to be more budget-friendly, but it comes at the cost of convenience and time. Which desk do you prefer? Let us know in a comment below.

media:group.media:title: BLU's First 5G Smartphone!
media:group.media:description:
Meet the BLU F91 5G, the company's first 5G budget smartphone. For $249, the F91 5G features a massive 5,000mAh battery with support for wireless charging, 6.8-inch Full HD+ display, quad camera system and octa-core processor with 128GB storage and 8GB RAM. What's not great to see, however, is the fact that it's only available for GSM carriers (not including AT&T or Cricket) and it comes running Android 11 with an outdated security patch. Do you think the BLU F91 5G is worth it?
BLU F91 5G on Amazon (affiliate link): https://amzn.to/3vICInc
Connect with BeauHD: https://linktr.ee/beauhd

entry.title: The Best Budget Smartphone of 2022 (So Far)

media:group.media:title: The Best Budget Smartphone of 2022 (So Far)
media:group.media:description:
The BLU G91 Max is the company's first budget flagship of 2022. For $249, it offers one of the most appealing price-to-spec ratios we've ever seen. Some of the features include a 6.8-inch FHD+ display, MediaTek 2.0GHz octa-core processor with 8GB RAM, quad camera array, 5,000mAh battery with wireless charging support, and microSD card slot for expandable storage. Oh, and how could we not mention it includes a 3.5mm headphone port? Check out our unboxing and review to learn more!
BLU G91 Max on Amazon (affiliate link): https://amzn.to/3BJHpQc
*LAUNCH DAY DEAL BRINGS THE PRICE DOWN TO $149!!!*

entry.title: BLU G91 Pro Unboxing and First Impressions

media:group.media:title: BLU G91 Pro Unboxing and First Impressions
media:group.media:description:
The G91 Pro is BLU's latest budget-friendly smartphone to hit Amazon. For $249, the G91 Pro offers a 6.7-inch Full HD+ display, MediaTek Helio G90 octa-core processor with 6GB RAM and 128GB internal storage, quad camera array, 5,000mAh battery and Android 11. It also has a handful of features you typically don't see in devices in this price range, such as wireless charging, a microSD card slot for expandable storage, and a headphone jack. Did we mention it also comes with a wall adapter IN THE BOX? If you're in the market for a new sub-$300 smartphone for GSM carriers like AT&T and T-Mobile, it's hard to go wrong with the G91 Pro.
BLU G91 Pro on Amazon: https://amzn.to/3sX5KOl
